email

This website is hosted by Github Pages. This means that all the sources files are open (as in open-source) in a Github repository and that you, as a reader, can contribute to the content. All you need to do is to send a pull request.

Inspirational

  • The importance of stupidity in scientific research
  • Cargo Cult Science
  • The pleasure of finding things out

Publication and presentation

  • LaTeX

Technical

  • Microwave101: An encyclopedic collection of microwave engineering knowledge with no lack of a sense of humor.
  • The Signal Path Blog: Review, teardown, and repair of electronic instrument, with a focus on high frequency gears. Be sure to subscribe to the Youtue channel also.
  • EEVblog: Video blog of everything about electronics from Dave Jones.
  • Talking Electronics: A wealth of electronics knowledge and all kinds of electronic project kits.
  • Matjaz S53MZ’s Ham Radio Site
  • Scotty Spectrum Analyzer: Build your own 3-GHz spectrum analyzer for under $1,000. Mailinglist

Misc

  • The Unofficial MTT Symposium Website
